topics.body:
Hey guys, I've been meaning to ask, but have you ever wondered how a fantasy vs modern world kind of thing would work out? I mean us with advanced technology and those of a fantasy world in which well they're living in the middle ages, where people joust and battle with swords and maybe crossbows. 
Although with some forms of magic. 

I mean in all honesty, I don't recall mages being able outsmart bullets. Oh well at least in the event we invade, we can create multi-class freaking combat mages, mix magic with guns, and whoop we can kick the crap out of almost anything. 

I'm still trying to figure out if a dragon would win against a fully armored tank though, a 120mm HEAT vs skin about as hard as tungsten...
I dunno how'd that work out.
topics.author: 5046d66d7f123b38980018c6
